definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit

sentences.english: They were waiting for the day to dawn.
The wind blew hard all night but let up at daybreak .
sentences.chinese: 整個晚上風颳很厲害，但到破曉時風勢減弱了。

sentences.english: The team had hiked through the night and reached Mount Rainier 's summit at dawn.
sentences.chinese: 這支隊伍徹夜攀登，破曉時登上雷尼爾山的頂峯。

sentences.english: Dawn clouds frame the East Lamma Channel and Hong Kong Island.
sentences.chinese: 時值破曉，東博寮海峽和香港島上浮雲飄蕩。

sentences.english: I wish to stay wth you in twilight waiting for break.
sentences.chinese: 我願意在暮光之城伴隨你一起等待破曉的毀滅。

sentences.english: During the busy harvest season, farmers get up at the crack of dawn and don't stop working until dusk.
sentences.chinese: 在農忙季節，農夫從破曉就開始起牀工作直到黃昏。

sentences.english: We have already described the knightly love which gave rise to the songs of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經敘述過那創造了破曉歌的騎士愛。

sentences.english: We attacked the enemy at dawn.
sentences.chinese: 我們在破曉時分襲擊了敵人。

sentences.english: The day was dawning when we set out.
After our talks, it was almost dawn.
sentences.chinese: 我們說完後，已是破曉時分了。

sentences.english: The sands of time are sinking, The dawn of heaven breaks;
sentences.chinese: 玉漏沙殘時將盡，天國即將破曉。

sentences.english: In her bed at peep of day?
Or doth the throstle sing with more glee , At daybreak than a twilight?
sentences.chinese: 亦或畫眉在破曉時分的歡欣，盛於薄暮時的歌唱？

sentences.english: I need to teach my early-rising toddler when morning has truly broken.
sentences.chinese: 破曉確實來臨時，我需要教我蹣跚學步的孩子早起。

sentences.english: The chorus of dawn birds is louder.
sentences.chinese: 破曉時分鳥兒們的大合唱就更大聲了。

sentences.english: Then at dawn we came down to a temperate valley.
sentences.chinese: 然後破曉時分我們來到一個溫暖的山谷。

definition: (of a city etc) ablaze with lights
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
not a sound to be heard (idiom)
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
